title: Prisma studio executor
description: The studio command allows you to interact with and manage your data interactively. It does this by starting a local web server with a web app configured with your project's data schema and records.

schema.description: Specifies the path to the desired schema.prisma file to be processed instead of the default path. Both absolute and relative paths are supported.

browser.description: The browser to auto-open Studio in.

port.description: The port number to start Studio on.
